skillTree.localised_description: There are benefits to serving one so... Skilled in flesh crafting.

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: The foolish chaos Knights had no idea what waited for them in death. Spurred on by their master few can face the brunt of their charge.

effects.description:
Unit Attribute: "Devestating Flanker" for Ensalved Revenant Knights
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
It's An Endless Abyss
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached

skillTree.localised_description: The caster weaves a confounding fog that numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard destroys their enemies from within, corroding foes' minds with doubt and crisis.

skillTree.localised_description: A spectral pendulum is summoned by the Wizard. On command, it swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.

skillTree.localised_description: A lifetime of combat has made me the blade

phases.onscreen_name: A life time of combat lead us to perfection

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: The spellcaster opens a vortex leading into the Pit. Anything caught within it will be lost forever.

skillTree.localised_description: Rabe has chosen to serve the Ordo Templarius of the von Carsteins of Castle Drakenhof. Shunning the brutish Blood Dragons and their archaic ways, Rabe dons a familar and yet new title. That of the Drakenhof Templar.
This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

effects.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

skillTree.localised_description: This Vampire Lord feints and shades, confounding their enemy into missteps and errors.
Vlad is borne to battle by powerful, dark effluvia, moving with a speed beyond mortal perception.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: "Come, my servants, we have a great work ahead of us."
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Rabe has chosen to align himself with that of the Ordo Draconis. He will not answer to the likes of scheming von Carsteins and their treacherous ways. Instead he will walk the path of the First Blood Dragon and seek to fight only the mightiest of champions.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: The first master of the Blood Dragons still walks among their ranks, and sees all that is done in his name.

skillTree.localised_name: Woe To All But The Worthy!
skillTree.localised_description: Many mortal champions regret their rash pride after the valiant challenge they issued is accepted by a creature whose eyes are the eyes of death itself.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.
Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.localised_description: Using a combination of their great strength and amazing speed, it’s easy for a Vampire to create a gap in their opponent’s guard.
If they won't move, make them!

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

items.colour_text: A family heirloom passed down through the generations. It was with Rabe when he was thought lost and so his family did despair it's loss. A small mercy they aren't around to see what hes twisted it's once powerful form into..

A magnificent shield gifted to Rabe by his sire. A faint etching is found on it's back - "Let your blade be your only truth, let death be your only answer, and let your quest be for nought but to become more than what you are."

effects.description:
Vampire Corruption + 5 to local province
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A seasoned veterean of many campiagns both in life and undeath, Rabe iis a master of combat and a follower of the ways of Abhorash.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
